0.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>a) <break time='200ms'/> Answer <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> following <break time='200ms'/> questions. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

1.text: 1. Where is Amitha's pen friend from?
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>1. <break time='200ms'/> Where <break time='200ms'/> is <break time='200ms'/> Amitha's <break time='200ms'/> pen <break time='200ms'/> friend <break time='200ms'/> from? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

2.text: 2. What did Svetlana send to Amitha?
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>2. <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> Svetlana <break time='200ms'/> send <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> Amitha? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

3.text: 3. Does Svetlana love nature? Support your answer by copying the line(s) from the letter.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>3. <break time='200ms'/> Does <break time='200ms'/> Svetlana <break time='200ms'/> love <break time='200ms'/> nature? <break time='200ms'/> Support <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> answer <break time='200ms'/> by <break time='200ms'/> copying <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> line(s) <break time='200ms'/> from <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> letter. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

4.text: 4. What did the Nature Club members do in February?
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>4. <break time='200ms'/> What <break time='200ms'/> did <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> Nature <break time='200ms'/> Club <break time='200ms'/> members <break time='200ms'/> do <break time='200ms'/> in <break time='200ms'/> February? <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

5.text: 5. Did the club members sell anything at the beach clean-up? Give reasons for your answer.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>5. <break time='200ms'/> Did <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> club <break time='200ms'/> members <break time='200ms'/> sell <break time='200ms'/> anything <break time='200ms'/> at <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> beach <break time='200ms'/> clean-up? <break time='200ms'/> Give <break time='200ms'/> reasons <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> your <break time='200ms'/> answer. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>

6.text: b) Write a letter to a pen friend asking about his/her plans for the year.
6.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>b) <break time='200ms'/> Write <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> letter <break time='200ms'/> to <break time='200ms'/> a <break time='200ms'/> pen <break time='200ms'/> friend <break time='200ms'/> asking <break time='200ms'/> about <break time='200ms'/> his/her <break time='200ms'/> plans <break time='200ms'/> for <break time='200ms'/> the <break time='200ms'/> year. <break time='200ms'/></prosody></speak>
